document.full_text: manchester united outclassed schalke 04 in a one-sided champions league semifinal first leg on tuesday, with goals from ryan giggs and wayne rooney.
document.title: manchester united 2, schalke 0: manchester united defeats schalke
lines_and_colors: manchester united outclassed schalke 04 in a one-sided champions league semifinal first leg on tuesday, with goals from ryan giggs and wayne rooney.
